card.name: East_Trading_Post
card.message: Can trade 1 coin for resources with player to the east.

card.name: West_Trading_Post
card.message: Can trade 1 coin for resources with player to the west.

card.name: Marketplace
card.message: Can trade 1 coin for industry products with adjacent players.

card.name: Vineyard
card.message: 1 coin for each resource card of adjacent players or your own.

card.name: Bazaar
card.message: 2 coins for each industry card of adjacent players or your own.

card.name: Haven
card.message: 1 coin and 1 vp for each resource card.

card.name: Lighthouse
card.message: 1 coin and 1 vp for each commercial card.

card.name: Chamber_Of_Commerce
card.message: 2 coins and 2 vps for each industrial card.

card.name: Arena
card.message: 3 coins and 1 vp for each completed wonder stage

card.name: Workers_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each resource card owned by adjacent players.

card.name: Craftmens_Guild
card.message: 2 vps for each industrial card owned by adjacent players.

card.name: Traders_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each commercial card owned by adjacent players.

card.name: Philosophers_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each scientific card owned by adjacent players.

card.name: Spy_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each military card owned by adjacent players.

card.name: Strategy_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each military defeat by adjacent players.

card.name: Shipowners_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each resource, industrial, and guild card.

card.name: Magistrates_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each structure card owned by adjacent players.

card.name: Builders_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each completed wonder stage by you or adjacent players.

card.name: Hideout
card.message: All other players lose 1 gold.

card.name: Gambling_Den
card.message: Adjacent players each get 1 gold.

card.name: Residence
card.message: Exempt from battle this era.

card.name: Clandestine_Dock_East
card.message: All trades to the east are 1 gold cheaper.

card.name: Clandestine_Dock_West
card.message: All trades to the west are 1 gold cheaper.

card.name: Pigeon_Loft
card.message: Copy one science product from any other player.

card.name: Secret_Warehouse
card.message: Provides an additional resource that you already produce.

card.name: Lair
card.message: All other players lose 2 gold.

card.name: Architect_Cabinet
card.message: Wonder stages are now free.

card.name: Sepulcher
card.message: All other players lose 1 gold for each military victory they have.

card.name: Consulate
card.message: Exempt from battle this era.

card.name: Black_Market
card.message: Produces a resource you do not yet produce.

card.name: Gambling_House
card.message: Adjacent players each get 2 gold.

card.name: Spy_Ring
card.message: Copy one science product from any other player.

card.name: Mourners_Guild
card.message: 1 vp for each military victory by adjacent players.

card.name: Counterfeiters_Guild
card.message: All other players lose 3 gold.

card.name: Guild_Of_Shadows
card.message: 1 vp for each black card built by adjacent players.

card.name: Slave_Market
card.message: 1 gold and 1 vp for each military victory.

card.name: Brotherhood
card.message: All other players lose 3 gold.

card.name: Secret_Society
card.message: 1 gold and 1 vp for each black card.

card.name: Builders_Union
card.message: All other players lose 1 gold for each completed wonder stage.

card.name: Torture_Chamber
card.message: Copy one science product from any other player.

card.name: Cenotaph
card.message: All other players lose 1 gold for each military victory.

card.name: Embassy
card.message: Exempt from battle this era.

card.name: Stage_2
card.message: Can now play 7th age card rather than discarding it.

card.name: Stage_2
card.message: Once per age can build a card for free.

card.name: Stage_1
card.message: Can trade 1 coin for resources with adjacent players.

card.name: Stage_3
card.message: Can copy one Guild card built by an adjacent player.

card.name: Stage_2
card.message: Can look through all discards, pick one, and build it for free.

card.name: Stage_1
card.message: Can look through all discards, pick one, and build it for free.

card.name: Stage_2
card.message: Can look through all discards, pick one, and build it for free.

card.name: Stage_3
card.message: Can look through all discards, pick one, and build it for free.

card.name: Stage_1
card.message: All other players lose 2 gold.

card.name: Stage_2
card.message: Exempt from battle this era.

card.name: Stage_1
card.message: Exempt from battle this era.

card.name: Stage_2
card.message: Exempt from battle this era.
